name: Play 4 Freedom
description:
The game has amazing graphics and smooth control feelings. Easy one-touch control and smooth operation with Many power-ups like coin magnet, power jumper, score multiplier, bouncer shoe!

Run, jump, dash, slide over and around different obstacles, and collect coins in this crazy 2D adventure new endless runner game for girls and boys of all ages.!

In this free infinite 2D running game you have to run through obstacles and collect coins.
